text:
A Man Because I Err

A lively street scene, Razumihin animated.  
“Talk your own nonsense, and I’ll kiss you for it!”  

---

Razumihin holds both ladies' hands tightly.  
“Going wrong in your way is better!”  

---

Pulcheria looks distressed, Avdotya surprised.  
“Leave off, I entreat you, what are you doing?”  
“Get up, get up!” Dounia laughs.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The speaker emphasizes the importance of making one's own mistakes as a path to truth and individuality, rather than conforming to others' ideas.
